mapper.select: select id,pid,no,create_time, update_time,test_result,test_file,test_box_file, test_type,test_start_time,test_end_time,test_msg,error_message from t_compression_record where pid = #{pid} and test_result=5 order by create_time desc limit 1

select id,pid,no,create_time, update_time,test_result,test_file,test_box_file, test_type,test_start_time,test_end_time,test_msg,error_message from t_compression_record where pid = #{pid} order by create_time desc
